name: Imbuement of Light
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
The touched melee weapon becomes imbued with light. During the wielder's turn, they can make one attack with it, targeting a 60 foot long line with one attack roll. Weapon styles can't be used with this attack. The first creature in the way takes normal weapon damage, plus 2d6 radiant damage, while all other creatures in the way only take the radiant damage.

Casting this spell on a weapon ends any other spells affecting that weapon.
empower: Removes the AP cost on this spell.
